title: nammamma shaaradhE
sahitya:
nammammA shArade umA mahEshwarI

nimmoLagihanArammA



anupallavi 



kammagOlana vairi sutanAda sonDila

hemmeya gaNanAthanE



caraNam 1



mOre kappina bhAva moradagalada kivi

kOredADeyanArammA

mUrukaNNana suta

muridiTTa chandrana

dhIra tA gaNanAthanE



caraNam 2 



uTTa pachcheya bigiduTTa chellaNada

diTTa tAnivanArammA

paTTada rANi pArvatiya kumAranu

hoTTeya gaNanAthanE



caraNam 3



rAshi vidyeya balla

ramaNI hambalanolla

bhAsHiganivanArammA

lEsAgi janara salahuva

kAginele

AdikEshava dAsa kaNE
